A historia é fantástica e surpreendente, te prende ao jogo até o fim. Jogo simplesmente genial!
Portal 1 foi somente um treinamento para os novos desafios.
It's a fun puzzle game that can keep you entertained for hours at a time.
One of the best games ever made, period

This is one of my favourite games and I would definately recommend it to anyone interested in puzzle solving games. Even though it was released in 2011, it has aged really well and the graphics still hold up today even though it is only on source 1!

One of the few games I've played that I would call perfect. 10/10
How does this game fuck your mic, what the hell

This is an awesome game, many times I have got off it wasn't because I'd rage quit.  I can't say that about most games.  If you liked the first Portal you are sure to love this one.  The game could be hard at times, I will admit that I got stuck on some easy puzzles.  And the boss fight was some what hard.  But moving on to the coop game.  It's very cool what Value did with this, instead of putting two Chells into the same room and completing puzzles.  You and a friend (or a random person if you don't have any) control two robots named P-Body and Atlas.  The puzzles in the coop game are great.  Anyways this was a good game, and if the autumn sale is still going on you could get Portal and Portal 2 for 3$.
El mejor puto juego cooperativo y sigleplayer que jugue en mi vida.

I don't like coop games. But I love this game so much. I played this game since I'm 11yo and I still love it and played it with a lot of friends on differents platforms.

Довольно интересная головоломка, в которой одной из ключевых вещей является - рекурсия. Вы сами всё поймете когда сыграете, желаю удачи!
Mucho mejor que la primera entrega! Su cooperativo es excelente, para jugarlo millones de veces y no aburrirse. Sin dudas es un Must play, esta saga es una obra maestra. Gracias Valve ♥

포탈1을 하고 이어서 플레이하였다.
1탄에서 살짝 아쉬웠던 볼륨이 충분히 늘어났다는 느낌이 들었다.
또한 서사가 굉장히 탄탄해서, 왜 글라도스가 게임계 전반에서도 돋보이는 캐릭터로 꼽히는지 체감할 수 있었다.
조작 방식은 1편과 동일하지만 퍼즐 요소에 피지컬까지 요구하는 부분이 마음에 더 들었다. 명작 중 명작.
Лично мне очень нравится эта игра, своим сюжетом , вроде трудными, а вроде и не очень сложными загадками. Концовка смогла вызвать мурашки.
I love it.  It has a good story and good mechanics.
One of the best games ever created!
